Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She turned and walked away.  She transformed into owl mode and tried 
to fly off, but her damaged wing wouldn't let her fly.  She 
transformed back into bot mode and ran over to Spears.
"Any ideas?"

Spears::
"Yeah I got one. You stay right here and don't move." 
Spears rose up and walked over to Unitron with a spear in her hand 
raised and aimed at Unitron.
"OK, now it's my turn. Let him go." she walked right up to Unitron 
and stood a few feet away from him with the spear in her hand.
"I said let him go!"
